price: 26.Habeenka qaarkina u sujuud, oo ammaan (hufna) in dheer oo habeenka ah.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbiḥ'hu laylan ṭawīlan
